long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension is aimed to exclude news articles from Google News using the keywords you specify. Add keywords you don't want to see to the prompt dialog. You will never see articles that contain them. Enjoy browsing news with a more tailored list!
